name: Skies Of Azula
description:
Peaceful skies of Azula call you to adventure! Gather your tools, find resources, survive and eventually explore, automate and industrialize!

The project

Skies Of Azula is a voxel survival game taking place in the flying archipelagos of Azula. Start your survival with rudimentary gear, and improve it with steampunk technology to build automation, aircrafts, machinery, automatons and more!

The project started on June 20th, 2020 by a single member, TheLerix (hi!). The stable version will be sold at $10, though this might change during the development!

The game is still in quite early development, but you can expect updates regularly.

The team

The team is made up of only one person currently, myself aka TheLerix. I am looking for help, so you can still try to join the team ;)

The demo

The available demo is still in very early access. Please read the README.txt file in the archive!
